basics.name: Shashvat Singhal
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: 3rd Year undergrad student at Delhi Technological University

volunteer.summary: Lead organizer for one of the largest AI-based hackathons in India, bringing together over 800 participants. Mentored and evaluated hundreds of individuals, fostering innovation and technical skill development.
Volunteered to create accessible resources, including e-books and videos, to provide fundamental computer science education for underprivileged students.

awards.title: Nation Winner Smart India Hackathon 2023
awards.summary: Winner in the Student Innovation for Transport and Logistics. Developed a multi-component traffic mitigation system, including a custom algorithm for adaptive traffic lights and advanced computer vision-based traffic monitoring. Also created a smart parking solution and conceptualized drone-based delivery systems.

publications.name: Audio Based Machine Fault Diagnosis using Hybrid Feature Extraction and Ensemble Learning
publications.publisher: 15th International Conference on Computing, Communication and Networking Technologies 2024 (ICCCNT 2024) Â· Nov 4, 2024
publications.summary: The study focused on audio-based machine fault detection, emphasizing feature extraction from audio signals to identify the most relevant features for maximizing model accuracy. Various feature sets were experimented with using multiple ensemble-based machine learning models. The developed pipeline achieved state-of-the-art (SOTA) accuracy, optimizing feature selection and model performance for fault detection.

publications.name: DSeP-xNet: A Feature Optimized Ensemble Framework for Hyperspectral-Based Soil Organic Carbon Prediction
publications.summary: Developed a novel pipeline for Soil Organic Carbon (SOC) prediction using hyper-spectral satellite imagery to enhance precision agriculture practices. Designed and implemented advanced machine learning and deep learning stacking ensemble models, incorporating noise reduction filters and dimensionality reduction techniques to optimize data processing and model performance. Achieved state-of-the-art (SOTA) accuracy, surpassing existing benchmarks. The research paper for this work was accepted in the 4th International Conference on AI-ML Systems.

projects.name: Quantum Computing
projects.summary: Quantum computing is the use of quantum-mechanical phenomena such as superposition and entanglement to perform computation. Computers that perform quantum computations are known as quantum computers.
